front: A stop sign is eight-sided and has a red background with white letters.
A school zone sign is five-sided and has a fluorescent yellow/green background with black symbols.
A yield sign is a triangle with a white background and a red border.
A railway crossing sign is X-shaped with a white background and red outline.
A red circle with a line through it means...
back: The activity shown is not allowed.

front: A sign with a green circle means...
back: You may or must do the activity shown inside the ring.

front: Diamond-shaped sign with a yellow background and black letters or symbols.
This sign warns of a steep hill ahead.
This sign warns that the pavement is slippery when wet.
This sign indicates a maximum safe speed for a curve.
